track.name: Three Hundred Pounds of Joy
comments: He sure knew how to break down the house :- )
awesome arrangement of a classic Wolf jam
fuck slim faggets. Big men are true men.

only 185 lbs of heavily joy here ... lol

nice simple yet fairly upbeat blues.
